brief_title: NovoLog Observation Trial in Subjects With Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes
brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The aim of this trial is to assess control of blood sugar, safety, and patient acceptance of insulin aspart compared to insulin lispro, both in insulin pumps, in standard clinical practice.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - People with Type I or Type II Diabetes - 18 Years or Older.
